titles.title: The Mystic Word Of Thine (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}That mystic word of Thine O sov'reign Lord Is all too pure Too high - too deep for me Weary of striving And with longing faint I breathe it back again In pray'r to Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide in me I pray And I in Thee From this good hour O leave me nevermore Then shall the discord cease The wound be healed The life-long bleeding Of the soul be o'er{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide in me O'ershadow by Thy love Each half-formed purpose And dark thought of sin Quench e'er it rise Each selfish low desire And keep my soul as Thine Calm and divine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As some rare perfume In a vase of clay Pervades it with a fragrance Not its own So when Thou dwellest In a mortal soul All heaven's own sweetness Seems around it thrown{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The soul alone Like a neglected harp Grows out of tune And needs that Hand divine Dwell Thou within it Tune and touch the chords Till every note and string Shall anwer Thine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide in me There have been moments blest When I have heard Thy voice And felt Thy power Then evil lost its grasp And passion hushed Owned the divine Enchantment of the hour{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}These were but seasons Beautiful and rare Abide in me And they shall ever be Fulfill at once Thy precept and my prayer Come and abide in me And I in Thee{/lang-eng}
